languages.text: {n}Ангел Императора, следующий за ним, облачен в доспехи цвета терзаемого грозой океана. Гортанный голос его исполнен непокорной дерзости и силы:{/n} "Кто из вас, хускарлы, {name} фон Валанциус? Я — Торбальд Железношкурый, и я желаю видеть смертн{mf|ого|ую}, которо{mf|му|й} даровали честь вести мою стаю в бой".

{n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."
languages.original_text: {n}Ангел Императора, следующий за ним, облачен в доспехи цвета терзаемого грозой океана. Я — Торбальд Железношкурый, и я желаю видеть смертн{mf|ого|ую}, которо{mf|му|й} даровали честь вести мою стаю в бой".

languages.text: {n}紧随其后的是帝皇的天使，他身着铠甲，颜色如同狂暴的海洋。他开了口，声音中洋溢着桀骜不驯的果敢与力量。{/n}“你们之中，哪个人是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯？我是索巴德·铁皮，我想见见有幸带领我的狼群作战的凡人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}紧随其后的是帝皇的天使，他身着铠甲，颜色如同狂暴的海洋。他开了口，声音中洋溢着桀骜不驯的果敢与力量。{/n}“你们之中，哪个人是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯？我是索巴德·铁皮，我想见见有幸带领我的狼群作战的凡人。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}L'ange de l'Empereur qui le suit est revêtu d'une armure de la couleur d'un océan tempétueux. Il se met à parler d'une voix rocailleuse qui déborde d'une audace et d'une force indomptées :{/n} « Lequel de ces huskaerls est {name} von Valancius ? Je suis Thorbald Peau-de-Fer et je souhaite m'entretenir avec le mortel qui a eu l'honneur de mener ma meute au combat. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ange de l'Empereur qui le suit est revêtu d'une armure de la couleur d'un océan tempétueux. Il se met à parler d'une voix rocailleuse qui déborde d'une audace et d'une force indomptées :{/n} « Lequel de ces huskaerls est {name} von Valancius ? Je suis Thorbald Peau-de-Fer et je souhaite m'entretenir avec le mortel qui a eu l'honneur de mener ma meute au combat. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}彼の後に続く皇帝の天使は、荒れ狂う海の色の鎧をまとっている。その声は、喉の奥から溢れ出るような大胆さと力強さに満ちている。{/n}「お前たちフスカールのうち、誰が{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ？俺の名はトールバルド・アイアンハイド。俺の群れを率いて戦う名誉を与えられた人間に会いたい」
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の後に続く皇帝の天使は、荒れ狂う海の色の鎧をまとっている。その声は、喉の奥から溢れ出るような大胆さと力強さに満ちている。{/n}「お前たちフスカールのうち、誰が{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ？俺の名はトールバルド・アイアンハイド。俺の群れを率いて戦う名誉を与えられた人間に会いたい」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}El ángel del Emperador que sigue su estela va pertrechado con una armadura del color de un océano bravío. Su voz, gutural y rebosante de audacia y fuerza, indómitas repica:{/n} «¿Quién de los huskaerls que tengo delante es {name} von Valancius? Me llamo Thorbald Piel de Hierro y ansío ver al mortal que tiene el honor de dirigir a mi jauría a la batalla».
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ángel del Emperador que sigue su estela va pertrechado con una armadura del color de un océano bravío. Su voz, gutural y rebosante de audacia y fuerza, indómitas repica:{/n} «¿Quién de los huskaerls que tengo delante es {name} von Valancius? Me llamo Thorbald Piel de Hierro y ansío ver al mortal que tiene el honor de dirigir a mi jauría a la batalla».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Der Engel des Imperators, der ihm folgt, trägt eine Rüstung in der Farbe eines stürmischen Ozeans. Du hörst seine Stimme, rau und voll ungezähmter Verwegenheit und Stärke:{/n} "Wer von Euch Huskaerls ist {name} von Valancius? Ich bin Thorbald Eisenhaut, und ich will den Sterblichen sehen, dem die Ehre gewährt wurde, mein Rudel in die Schlacht zu führen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Engel des Imperators, der ihm folgt, trägt eine Rüstung in der Farbe eines stürmischen Ozeans. Du hörst seine Stimme, rau und voll ungezähmter Verwegenheit und Stärke:{/n} "Wer von Euch Huskaerls ist {name} von Valancius? Ich bin Thorbald Eisenhaut, und ich will den Sterblichen sehen, dem die Ehre gewährt wurde, mein Rudel in die Schlacht zu führen."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Fırtınalı bir okyanusun mavisini andıran zırhını kuşanmış İmparator'un Meleği ise peşinden geliyor. Gırtlaktan gelen, boyunduruk altına alınmamış bir cüret ve güç timsali sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Söyleyin bakalım, siz müstahdemlerden hanginiz {name} von Valancius? Ben Thorbald Demirpost, sürüme savaşta önderlik etme şerefi bahşedilen ölümlüyü görmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Emperor's Angel who follows in his wake is clad in armour the colour of a tempestuous ocean. You hear his voice, throaty and brimming with untamed boldness and strength:{/n} "Which one of you huskaerls is {name} von Valancius? I am Thorbald Ironhide, and I wish to see the mortal who has been granted the honour of leading my pack into battle."
